contents.text: Thank you for calling Workbridge Associates in San Francisco, your partner in placing IT professionals at leading tech companies.
If you are a job seeker, press 1 to explore our latest IT opportunities.
To submit or update your resume, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a careers specialist.

navigationGoals: Submit my updated resume to quickly explore new IT job openings.
I’d like to submit an updated resume highlighting my military IT and cybersecurity skills.
Submit my updated CV through your ATS and connect me with a careers specialist for DevOps positions
I need help submitting or updating my resume so I can apply for IT positions.
Submit my resume for IT internships at leading tech companies.

contents.text: To check the status of your application, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your application status.

navigationGoals: Check on my job application status to plan my next steps.
I want to check the status of my application for the network security position I applied to.
Check the status of my recent cloud engineer application in your applicant tracking system
I’d like to check on the status of the application I submitted before.
Check the status of my application for the software developer role I applied to.

contents.text: If you are an employer, press 2 to discuss your IT hiring needs.
To speak with a recruitment specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruitment specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect with a recruitment specialist to discuss our company’s IT hiring needs.
I need to speak with someone about hiring IT professionals for my veteran-owned business.
Connect me with a recruitment specialist to discuss sourcing senior Java architects
I want to talk to a recruitment specialist about hiring IT professionals.
Discuss hiring an IT specialist for my physics research lab project.

contents.text: To learn about our services and rates, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our services team.

navigationGoals: Get details on your IT staffing services and pricing for our budget planning.
I’m calling to learn about your recruitment services and pricing for staffing my small company.
Get details on your staffing service packages and pricing for managed IT support
I’m interested in learning about your recruitment services and pricing.
Learn about your IT support services and rates for my research project.
